author: GlaucusResearch
content: We are Short $AAMC and Long $RESI.  Click here for our full report at https://t.co/ktIznTmt5x

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We believe that $RESI's independent directors have a fiduciary duty to terminate the $AAMC Agreement.

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We estimate that $RESI pays $AAMC 4x-7x what similarly situated mortgage REITs are paying for asset management services.

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Cutting $AAMC's fees we estimate would boost $RESI's 2015 dividend by $0.15 per quarter per share!

author: GlaucusResearch
content: $RESI independent directors have a duty to provide $AAMC with notice of termination on June 24, 2014 for unreasonable compensation

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We estimate that $AAMC share price will fall by up to 87% as its compensation is brought in line with market rates

author: GlaucusResearch
content: $RESI's independent directors must act quickly: with each passing quarter, $AAMC Termination Fee will only get larger.

author: GlaucusResearch
content: $AAMC management team is financially incentivized to generate large asset management fees at the expense of $RESI shareholders.

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We are short Asia Plastic Recycling (“APR”) (TWSE: 1337) with a price target of TWD 0.00. Our full report is at https://t.co/ktIznTmt5x

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We believe that APR’s actual earnings are around 90% less than the figures reported in the Company’s Taiwan filings. #glaucus

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We believe that APR overstated its capital expenditures by at least RMB 422mm. #Glaucus

author: GlaucusResearch
content: APR earns the same EBIT margin as Microsoft by recycling EVA foam scraps into shoe soles.  Is that credible?  #Glaucus

author: GlaucusResearch
content: APR’s average selling price decreased by 27% in 2012, yet its gross margin suspiciously increased from 38% to 40%. #Glaucus

author: GlaucusResearch
content: According to public land records, APR purchased land in Fujian for RMB31mm, which is 75% less than the RMB126mm reported to investors.

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Glaucus Research issues rebuttal to Asia Plastic Recycling (TWSE: 1337) and maintains Strong Sell rating.#glaucus https://t.co/Usf5XIPMpf

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We believe that APR’s response is unsatisfactory and fails to address the publicly available independent evidence presented in our report.

author: GlaucusResearch
content: 東芝は7年間で利益を1,518億円水増ししたというスキャンダルによって崩壊寸前まで追い込まれた。

author: GlaucusResearch
content: 弊社は、伊藤忠が炭鉱事業の価値が大幅に下落していたにも拘わらず、損失を認識することなく区分変更することで、2015年3月期だけで純利益を1,531億円水増ししたと考えている。この点を訂正しただけで、伊藤忠の当期純利益（3,006億円）は51％減の1,475億円となったはずである

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Glaucus is short Fullshare (HK: 0607). We value Fullshare at HK$0.55 per share. Full Report at  https://t.co/ktIznTlVfZ

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We believe that Fullshare is one of the largest stock manipulation schemes trading on any exchange anywhere in the world

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Intraday trading patterns indicate that like Hanergy and Tech Pro, Fullshare’s stock appears to be manipulated in the final hour of trading

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Glaucus issues Comprehensive Rebuttal to Fullshare’s (HK: 607) Clarification Announcement. Full Rebuttal at  https://t.co/ktIznTlVfZ

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Fullshare fails to give any meaningful rebuttal to data indicating that its stock is manipulated in the final hour of trading

author: GlaucusResearch
content: In FY 2016, Fullshare generated only RMB 132 mm in EBIT from con’t ops, meaning it trades at over 400 times recurring operating profits

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Despite a 264x increase in market cap since 2013, Fullshare’s cash flows from its recurring ops has increased only 28%

author: GlaucusResearch
content: If an investor bought and held Fullshare’s stock from Dec 5, 2016, through April 24, 2017, it would have generated a loss of -20%

author: GlaucusResearch
content: But if an investor only invested in the last hour of each day during that period, compounded returns would have been a staggering 59%!

author: GlaucusResearch
content: More confirmation that Fullshare’s stock is manipulated: looks like Zall bought 15+ mm shares at 2.94 in the last hour of trading yesterday
